name: Kissmanga - Purple Minimalistic
description:
A somewhat minimalistic flat purple Kissmanga theme with options to disable comments and limit image width(useful for double page images that go off screen).

Also hides ads and social media elements.
additional_info: Updates: 2015-12-28 - fixed the issue with comments not displaying

discussions.name: for those having a problem in disqus comments not showing... here's the fix.

style_setting_options.label: Enabled
Disabled
Fit to screen
Fit, but show full size on hover
